Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were used for overexpression and knockdown experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced mitophagy levels in Parkin(C289G) mutants were rescued by HSJ1a overexpression.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across independent cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for Western blot analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfection was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis of protein expression levels.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitophagy levels â‰¥ 80% of wild-type controls.
